Congressional Reports: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

The Committee on Energy and Natural Resources, to which was referred the bill (S. 1719) to require the Secretary of the Interior to offer to sell to certain public agencies the indebtedness representing the remaining repayment balance of certain Bureau of Reclamation projects in Texas, and for other purposes, having considered the same, reports favorably thereon with an amendment and an amendment to the title and recommends that the bill, as amended, do pass.
